entries.title: Freewriting
entries.entry: Sometimes I feel like I'm the only one who doesn't fit in. I don't like the way the teachers treat me like I'm some kind of problem. I don't like the way they talk to me like I'm stupid. I don't like the way they expect me to be like everyone else. I'm not like everyone else. I'm different and I'm proud of it. I'm not going to conform to their expectations. I'm going to be my own person and do my own thing.

entries.title: Connecting with nature
entries.entry: Today I went for a walk in the park and it was really nice. I felt so connected to nature and it was really calming. I felt like I could just be myself and not worry about anyone judging me. I felt like I could just be in the moment and appreciate the beauty of nature. It was a really nice feeling and I'm glad I took the time to do it.

entries.title: Freewriting
entries.entry: Sometimes I feel like I'm stuck in a rut. I feel like I'm not making any progress and I'm just spinning my wheels. I feel like I'm not getting anywhere and it's really frustrating. I want to make a change but I don't know how. I want to do something different but I'm scared of the unknown. I want to take a risk but I'm scared of failing. I just don't know what to do.

entries.title: Freewriting
entries.entry: Today was a really tough day. I got into an argument with my teacher and it was really embarrassing. I felt like everyone was judging me and it was really uncomfortable. I just wish I could have handled it better. I wish I could have kept my cool and not let my emotions get the best of me. I just need to learn to control my temper better.

entries.title: Freewriting
entries.entry: Sometimes I feel like I'm not good enough. I feel like I'm not smart enough or talented enough. I feel like I'm not living up to my potential and it's really discouraging. I want to do better but I don't know how. I want to be successful but I'm scared of failure. I just don't know what to do.

entries.title: Curiosity and learning
entries.entry: Today I decided to take a risk and try something new. I decided to take a class on a subject I'm not familiar with and it was really interesting. I learned a lot and it was really fun. I'm glad I took the chance to learn something new. I'm also glad I didn't let my fear of failure stop me from trying something new. I'm really proud of myself for taking the risk.
